com.skobbler.ngx

Class SKCoordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.SKCoordinate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SKTrailPosition

    public class SKCoordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about a coordinate.
    Version:
    2.4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SKCoordinate()
      Creates a SKCoordinate object having latitude and longitude as 0.
      SKCoordinate(double longitude, double latitude)
      Creates a SKCoordinate object.
